name: Submit response
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for submit the user response for each question in quiz model.

Request payload must contain the following fields:

quiz_question_id : NUMBER
selected_option: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/reflectiveQuiz/1/response

raw 
  {
    "reflective_quiz_question_id":1,
    "selected_option":"o1"   
}

Response:

200 - OK 

  {"status":200,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"reflective_quiz_response_id":6,"user_id":40,"video_id":"1","response":"{\"1\":{\"reflective_quiz_question_id\":1,\"selected_option\":\"o1\",\"question\":\"Adila says she loves how beautiful her school looks when it rains! \\n\\t\\tCan you tell us what do you love most about the place you live in?\",\"correct_answer\":\"\",\"level\":\"HARD\",\"question_no\":1,\"attachments\":\"\",\"is_correct\":true}}","status":"ACTIVE","created_by":40,"created_at":"2022-09-11T13:32:55.000Z","updated_by":40,"updated_at":"2022-09-23T09:56:09.697Z","is_correct":true,"msg":"“Great! It is our responsibility to protect and take care of the things we love”","redirect_to":1}]}
